column4: Can anyone help me.. i've tried everything that i could think of.. Does anyone have CS:S working on linux, with sound, steam working good, etc?
I'm sure there are loads of articels on google for that game
being as popular as it is
yeah i'm running the game with wine, it runs fine, just as good as it would on linux, except i cant figure out how to get sound to work on it. :\
